page.title: 06People Who Help Us. Karin
page.content: A POSTMAN is the person who delivers letters to our house and posts them through our letterbox. The process begins when we post a letter into a post box. A postman comes and collects the letters from the box and takes them to be sorted. Then the postman brings the letters to our door. A DUSTBINMAN is a person who collects the rubbish from our homes, puts it in his cart and takes it to a special dump with all the other rubbish. A POLICEMAN OR WOMAN is someone who tries to defend the law by arresting people who commit crimes, such as theft, violence or murder. Some people go to court and then prison; others just pay a fine. Police also help the community in various ways, such as by retrieving lost property.
